author: wmtan
body:
This pull request adds the consumes interface to the class FastTSGFromPropagation.
In the relvals, this class is used by module TSGFromL2Muon.
This PR also fixes memory leaks by using smart pointers rather than bare pointers for member objects owned by this class.  New objects are allocated each run, and in some cases the previously allocated objects were not deleted before the new ones were allocated.  Rather than deciphering the mess and adding the delete operator where needed, it was much easier and better to switch to smart pointers.
title: add consumes interface, and fix memory leaks in FastTSGFromPropagation
